name: Rainbow Unicorn Desserts Maker
description:
Wow! I got a new message.
What’s this? Glow in the dark party? It looks pretty cool! The party will start tonight! I don’t want to miss it. Let’s go!
Here we come! OMG! This party is so cool! There are so many glow things I never seen before! Such as glow decorations, glow make-up, glow body painting, and the coolest glow desserts!
Do you want to know how to make these cool desserts, and enjoy them while you having fun in the party?
Alright! Just come with me! Let’s get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make super cool glow in the dark desserts
-Four kinds of desserts to make: glow cotton candy, glow cupcake, glow milkshake and glow ice cream
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: induction cooker, pan, spoon, cotton candy maker, glow cotton candy sticks, bowl, flour sieve, cream mixer, spatula, paper cups, cupcake molds, oven, piping bags, waffle cone maker, ice cream cone roller, baking pan, glass jars, milkshake dispensers, ice cube molds, freezer, knife, cutting board, food processors, straws and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: sparkling sugar, fruits, sprinkles, candies, bow ties, milk, salt, baking powder, flour, fluorescence food coloring, cream topping, eggs, water, butter, syrup, coating, soy milk, yogurt and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different cooking modules for glow cotton candy, glow cupcake, glow milkshake and glow ice cream
- Try different tools to make your desserts
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your desserts
- Decorate your desserts with beautiful chocolate syrup, glow sprinkles, candies, fruits, straws, glow sticks and bow ties

Important Message for Purchases:
- This App is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
